tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to share my experience with Dr. R.G.Holla.

My Son was born in January 2014 and he was present as a pediatrician during birth of my son.

From that time, he is our regular pediatrician for my son. * **** *** ** ** *** **** ******* He listens all our problem very patiently and gives the best advise. He handles children very gently and diligently.

At every stage of life of my son, he tells us what next activity will be done by our son. He is master of every child disease (e.g. cough, fever, cold etc.) *** ********* ** **** ********** For every vaccine, we are going to him. He is very genuine person and never suggest unnecessary vaccine.

I would highly recommend him.

Regards
Anil Dani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** ** ********* ******* I have been taking my daughter to him since birth. Now she 8 and never there has been a chance that I wasn’t satisfied. Friendly and listens to your queries at length. In fact now most of my relatives and friends take their babies to him and thank me for recommending.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very approachable, humble, professional and a comforting person. We feel contend to show our child to Brig R G Hola (Retd) as we get more advices and instructions which includes proper medical practise. His explanations for the causes of sickness and medicine prescriptions have been trust worthy..

tags: None
review:
Dr. Hola is an excellent professional.  We are Consulting him since almost a year now. 
He's quiet positive and versatile. We will definitely recomend him.

review: He is a  doctor who believes in less dependence on medicines.He prescribe medicine for those problems thats strictly needed otherwise he explains that for such problem no medicine requires as it will happen surely.He listens to us patiently and give detailed knowledge and very familiar with sympotms and cause of froblem.

review: Understands the symptoms and treats accordingly. Does what is needed for the patient. No unnecessary medicines or tests. I find him to be reliable *** *************
